CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic effects of PCDSeBT were investigated in BHJ PSCs with the device structures of the standard configuration glass / ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PCDSeBT : PC71BM / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| PC71BM |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |
| ITO |
| Al |

Note:

* PCDSeBT: Poly(3,3'-dihexyl-2,2'-bithienylene-5,5'-diselenophene)
* PC71BM: [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester
* PEDOT: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)
* PSS: Polystyrene sulfonate
* ITO: Indium tin oxide
* Al: Aluminum

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid material names:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCDSeBT |
| PC71BM |
| PEDOT |
| PSS |

The following entities were removed:

* "glass" (not a material name)
* "Al" (not a material name, abbreviation for aluminum)

Note:

* PCDSeBT: Poly(3,3'-dihexyl-2,2'-bithienylene-5,5'-diselenophene)
* PC71BM: [6,6]-Phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester
* PEDOT: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene)
* PSS: Polystyrene sulfonate
